issue.title: Missing patterns from .gitignore
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-103](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-103). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are some build files created on at least my platform (such as libpyarrow.dylib) that aren't covered by any of the patterns in the .gitignore files.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-103?focusedCommentId=15244655) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 62
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/62>
